casebody.data:
Arthur BARTOLOZZI, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES. No. 7222. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Jan. 4, 1940. L. Scott Cherchesky, of Camden, N. J., for appellant. John J. Quinn, U. S. Atty., of Trenton, N. J., and W. Orvyl Schalick, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Camden, N. J., for appellee.

Before BIGGS, MARIS, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court is affirmed.
